title: I got hard reset from Diamond 3?

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
I was told to post this forum about the bug I encountered on my account, to save time I'll just copy paste my conversation.

**"Okay, so I finished in Diamond 4 at the end of season 5. And by the end of preseason 6 I finished in Diamond 3 with 64 LP. Now with the new season beginning I am unable to play with all of my high elo friends (plat and over) in the new dynamic queue? I'm not sure what is going on but I think I've been hard reset by mistake or something? You can even check your database or where ever my account data is stored for proof of my MMR. I would really love if you guys could fix this as soon as possible so I can play in my original elo. I was planning on racing my friends to Challenger but with this issue in the way I wont be able to.

I'm not entirely sure if I'm the only one with this problem. Please help me and thank you for your time."**

and the player support responded with this.

**Greetings Summoner,

Unfortunately, we are aware that issues sometimes arise in our game. We're always looking into ways to minimize these occurrences. If you haven't already, I recommend posting a description of what happened on our bug reports forum:

EU West - http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/suggestions-bug-reports-en
EU Nordic & East - http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/suggestions-bug-reports-en
NA- http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report

If you're not sure what information would be of assistance, here are some tips on reporting bugs:

When submitting a bug report, please put 'Bug - <short description of bug>' in the subject line.

The section below should be a detailed description of your problem:

Steps to reproduce (Example:)
Clicked on 'Play Game.'
Joined a game called 'game', hosted by 'host'
Was on the Blue Team.
Entered Champion Selection Page
Selected Champion 'Ryze'
Game Launch
Game never loaded

Thanks again for the report, and please let me know if you have any other questions!

Itachi
The Rogue Ninja
Riot Games Player Support
Preferred Role: Fill or Ninjas :3**

Could somebody please help me? My MMR for some reason was hard reset back to 0 or something. It seems like I'm the only one with this issue.

replies.body: Hey mate, what was your ticket number? I will try look into it as soon as possible

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=pbQBAIke,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-01-24T07:15:19.662+0000)
>
> Hey mate, what was your ticket number? I will try look into it as soon as possible

REQUEST #20093157
Thanks boss
Can you also update your support ticket with a screen shot of you unable to invite players that are plat/diamond

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=pbQBAIke,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2016-01-24T07:26:50.025+0000)
>
> Can you also update your support ticket with a screen shot of you unable to invite players that are plat/diamond

Done :^)

Here's a screenshot of me finishing in D4 at the end of Season 5.
https://gyazo.com/c3aa4b34b2aa25de878de3d519ff8eb8
Experiencing the same thing, can't ranked with friends the same rank as me, there are so many posts on this which havent been addressed

Hey there Milky,

Have you submitted a bug report as Player Support asked?

Right now you're not currently ranked? are your friends? are you trying to play ranked with them while being unranked yourself?
